mojichimera:BiasedPower.NAME: Biased
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, lose #b

mojichimera:NextTurnStartPlayPower.NAME: Prepared
DESCRIPTIONS: In #b%1$s turns, play #b%2$s copyreplace of %3$s at the start of your turn.
At the start of next turn, play #b%1$s copyreplace of %2$s.

mojichimera:NextTurnAddToHandPower.NAME: Mass Production
DESCRIPTIONS: In #b%1$s turns, add #b%2$s copyreplace of %3$s to your hand.
At the start of next turn, add #b%1$s copyreplace of %2$s to your hand.

mojichimera:SteelizePower.NAME: Steelize
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase card values by #b%2$s%% for the next #b%1$s cardreplace played this turn.

mojichimera:StormProtocolPower.NAME: Storm Protocol
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a Power, play #b%1$s copyreplace of %2$s.

mojichimera:DarkProtocolPower.NAME: Dark Protocol
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you Exhausts a card, play #b%1$s copyreplace of %2$s. Cannot be triggered recursively.

mojichimera:RushdownProtocolPower.NAME: Rushdown Protocol
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you enters Wrath, play #b%1$s copyreplace of %2$s.

mojichimera:ThornsProtocolPower.NAME: Thorns Protocol
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you are attacked, play #b%1$s copyreplace of %2$s back.

mojichimera:FireBreathingProtocolPower.NAME: Fire Breathing Protocol
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a Status or Curse card, play #b%1$s copyreplace of %2$s.

mojichimera:SadisticProtocolPower.NAME: Sadistic Protocol
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, play #b%1$s copyreplace of %2$s. Cannot be triggered recursively.

mojichimera:FreePower.NAME: Free
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, play #b%1$s copyreplace of %2$s.

mojichimera:EveryTurnStartPlayPower.NAME: Free
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, play #b%1$s copyreplace of %2$s.
